        public boolean isAccessible(AccessType accessType,
                   String entityName,
                   Object... parameters)
        Description copied from interface: AccessManager
        Checks whether an entity with the specified name, that was constructed with the specified constructor-arguments would be accessible with the specified access-type.
        Specified by:
        isAccessible in interface AccessManager
        Parameters:
        accessType - the access type
        entityName - the name of the entity (may be entity-name according to the JPA Spec or fully qualified class-name)
        parameters - the constructor-arguments
        Returns:
        whether the entity is accessible
